thread.title: Kenny H

author: Kenny H
title: Kenny H
text: Fantastic service and quality... the man was polite and on time. He also gave me a call to say he was close. Easy to book online. Only issue was that it's unclear they only take card when you pay after fitting so you might as well pay online before. Bit stupid as I took the cash out expecting to pay after the service only to be told they would remove the tyre if I couldn't find a card to pay on.
